DOC.brief_summary: To investigate effect daily administration low-dose aspirin , compare placebo , IVF ICSI outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Does Low-Dose Aspirin Improve Outcome In Vitro Fertilisation/Intra Cytoplasmatic Sperm Injection ( IVF/ICSI ) ?
DOC.criteria: Dutchspeaking woman Starting first second IVF/ICSI cycle Women suffer platelet dysfunction thrombopenia gastrointestinal ulcer recurrent gastritis aspirin hypersensitivity Women treatment anticoagulant aspirin
